CONVERSATION GROUP: I am the god of this city and soon my brethren and I will reclaim our rightful place as masters of this world.
I will do whatever I must to take the Moontear from you.
If you insist on fighting me... I will give you the challenge you demand. Face my most powerful servant: Themberchaud, Wyrmsmith of Gracklstugh!
The gray dwarves thought they were safe from us. They thought they had won their freedom. That the Moontear could protect them.
How fitting that the Moontear became the source of their downfall. With its power, I have become their master.
Hand over the Moontear before there's any more trouble.
Fools! With the power of the Moontear in my hands nothing can stop me.
You think you can take it from me? Fools! The Moontear's power is beyond you.
You will fall to my control, and when you do, you will not remember what it was you fought so bravely to obtain.
BK cut If you will not bow, then fight.

You freed my mind, and for that, you live. When next we meet, I will not extend that same... courtesy.
BK I cut NPC lines
 HOMMET: That has to be the nicest thing a red dragon has ever said.
 ILYDIA: Go! We must retrieve the Moontear! Now!
